content: mollie the bunny is just waiting to hop into a nursery near you to be somebody s best friend she s got her own little t-shirt to wear long floppy ears and plumpy feet that are just the right size for little hands to squeeze **you will need** 50g balls of paintbox yarns cotton aran 3 × a - vanilla cream 608 1 × b - slate green 627 1 × c - vintage pink 656 4 50mm uk7 - us 7 crochet hook 12mm safety eyes toy stuffing scissors yarn needle black yarn for nose **gauge gauge ** 17 sts and 19 row to a 10cm 4in square using 4 50mm uk7 - us 7 crochet hook or size required to obtain gauge gauge
